thread.title: Kim Kardashian tears up as she recalls terrifying moment she pleaded with Paris robbers to "let me live"
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian tears up as she recalls terrifying moment she pleaded with Paris robbers to "let me live"

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Kim Kardashian tears up as she recalls terrifying moment she pleaded with Paris robbers to "let me live"
text:
Celebs Kim Kardashian tears up as she recalls terrifying moment she pleaded with Paris robbers to "let me live" The reality star opens up about her ordeal in an upcoming episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians Share Click   Scott Disick Breaks Down over Kourtney Kardashian: 'I'm a Sex Addict!' Share this video Get   
Kim Kardashian sobbed as she recalled the moment she pleaded with her Paris robbers to spare her life. 
In the preview for the second episode in the latest season of Keeping Up With The Kardashians, the mum-of-two opens up about the scary incident which saw armed thieves escape with jewellery worth around £8.7m. 
The teaser starts with the sisters and Kris Jenner jetting into the French Capital for Fashion Week last October. 
“Oh my god I cannot wait for Paris Fashion Week!” Kim gushes. 
But just moments later a French voice cuts in: "911 speaking good evening. What is your emergency?" Kim Kardashian breaks down in tears (Photo: E! Entertainment) Kim recalls the terrifying ordeal (Photo: E! Entertainment) 
Speaking to camera, a teary Kim reveals: “I just said, 'Please - I have a family - let me live.'" 
It then cuts to Kim and her sisters sitting on the sofa. 
"They’re either going to shoot me in the back or if the elevator does not open in time, I’m f**ked. There’s no way out," the reality star sobs. Read More Kim Kardashian in floods of tears when she learns of Kanye's breakdown as rapper storms off stage (Photo: FameFlynet) 
Although 17 arrests have been made following the robbery, only a handful of people have been charged and none of the items stolen from Kim, 36, including two Cartier diamond bracelets, a Jacob necklace in gold inlaid with diamonds, earrings with diamonds by Loraine Schwarz, a necklace by Loraine Schwarz with diamonds and a diamond ring worth $4 million, have been returned to her. 
Elsewhere in the first episode, Kourtney and Scott's strained relationship is laid bare as they spend time together in Miami. 
"I really do enjoy hanging out with Scott and the kids because we know what were doing," Kourt admits in a confessional. Kim Kardashian (Photo: Splash News) 
"When we’re out socially I just don’t know how to act. For so many years I’ve been used to playing a certain role and having to be responsible and watching out for his behaviour. 
"He can be a little bit obnoxious and when I‘m in Miami trying to have fun with my friends I just don't want him to bring me down." 
However, later in the episode the pair appear to iron out their differences after sitting down for a heart to heart. Read More (Photo: E!) (Photo: E!) 
Scott says: "I guess we both need to do our thing without us being together. I feel like maybe there are times you want to run around with your girlfriends and don’t want your ex-boyfriend to be there. 
"And if I’m hitting the strip I probably don’t want you rolling. So knock yourself out, kid," he quips. 
"Oh yeah, buckle your seatbelt," the mum-of-three replies. 
To camera, Kourtney adds: "I'm happy Scott is bringing this up. Communicating is something we’re not good at at together. I think it’s going to be a constant process to figure out how to live life parenting out kids, being a family but not being together." 
Keeping Up With The Kardashians is available now in the UK & Ireland on hayu & 19th March at 9pm on E! Like us on Facebook
